Like most jails, the vast majority of those incarcerated under these brutal and dangerous conditions are there pretrial.

This can't go on any longer.

Contact Mayor Kenney and urge him to use his executive authority to declare an immediate emergency declaration and conduct a full investigation into the inhumane and dangerous conditions in Philadelphia jails.
